original_text: (For from my youth he was brought up with me, as with a father, and I have guided her from my mother's womb;)
korean_text: 실상은 내가 젊었을 때부터 고아 기르기를 그의 아비처럼 하였으며 내가 어렸을 때부터 과부를 인도하였노라

sentences.original_text: For from my youth he was brought up with me,
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 어린 시절부터 그는 나와 함께 자랐고,
